reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with one noting it's not itchy. Customers like the color options and consider it good value for money, with one noting it can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy oversized sweater!
items.body: Definitely oversized, as I wanted. I'm 5'2", 125 pounds. It's longer than I'd hoped, but I do love a big, baggy sweater. Machine washed in warm, and dried on medium high heat hoping for some shrinkage. Surprisingly, it only shrunk just a bit, but the fabric remained soft and cozy, with no pilling. All in all, it's a cute sweater. I'd probably order a small or medium next time. Read more
items.author: PAULA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and well made sweater
items.body: I loved this sweater! It’s soft and fits great, it is oversized which is what I wanted . True to size . I got a large and it fits great being oversized but not to much . But if you don’t want it oversized I would do a size down . Great fabric and great fit . It’s thick enough but not to thick that it’s bulky . Read more
items.author: elizabeth elmore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars She’s a little oversized. Plenty of room!
items.body: 5 stars for sure. This sweater is so comfy!! So so soft. Not to heavy. I’m so in love with it. It’s kind of a grayish blue. Very good quality. Got it on a Black Friday sale… get it while you still can. You will not regret!! Read more
items.author: KCP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT SWEATER
items.body: COZY- SOFT AND GREAT FIT!! LOVE IT USUSALLY WOUL WEAR XXL XL FITS PERFECT Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but....
items.body: Great sweater and well made. Washes well also. Im 5 '1 and 125 and ordered a small. Only thing is I do believe one sweater i ordered was someone's return. It smells like ladies perfume and there was no tag on it like the other sweater I bought. Read more
items.author: Amazon CustomerDenise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value
items.body: Very soft and cozy. Runs generously. Very nice quality I ordered a second one in another color. I would highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Sylvan Beach

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute sweater!
items.body: This sweater is very soft, cute and well made! I love it on here to order it in another color! Read more
items.author: Rizzo’s Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, cozy, great buy!
items.body: Just like the photos. Cozy, great quality. Arrived with some creases but I did a quick steam and they were all out. I usually wear anywhere from a L-XL depending on the fit. I got the XL and its oversized and long which I prefer. It can be tucked etc. Highly recommend! The blue navy color is really pretty. Read more
items.author: Laura

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, White, Beige, Burgundy, Apricot, Royal Blue, Army Green, Black, Dusty Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
